title: Taking Responsibility
description: Noah talks about taking responsibility during a team project and what he learned from it.
speaker: Noah
text: A few months ago, I was part of a team working on an important project at work.
Each person had a clear role, and the deadline was very tight.
One week before the deadline, a teammate became sick and could not continue his tasks.
At first, we felt stressed and unsure how to manage the situation.
After discussing the problem, I decided to take responsibility for some of his work.
I worked extra hours and asked other team members for support when needed.
Although it was challenging, we managed to finish the project on time.
Our manager appreciated our teamwork and commitment.
This experience taught me that taking responsibility and helping others can strengthen a team.
